data.title: Exor Ventures Invests in the €9.2 Million Series Seed Financing of Zeliq
meta_keywords: Exor Ventures Invests in the €9.2 Million Series Seed Financing of Zeliq
data.meta_description: Goodwin's Technology team guided Exor Ventures in a €9.2M Series Seed investment in Zeliq, an AI sales solution provider, with participation from Resonance VC at the pre-seed stage.
data.text:
Goodwin’s Technology team advised Exor Ventures on its investment in the €9,2 million Series Seed financing of Zeliq, an AI sales solution provider.

The round was led by Exor Ventures and included Resonance VC, which also invested at the pre-seed stage.

Founded in 2023, Zeliq is a company specialized in the development and the commercialization of solution that gives to its customers the most accurate prospect data.

The company now aims to expand in the US, using new funds for marketing, product development, and growing its team.

The Goodwin team was led by Thomas Dupont-Sentilles and included Louis Taslé d’Héliand and Inès Louguar on corporate aspects and Marie Fillon and Louis de Chezelles on IP aspect.
